Name: L'Amour
Review Text: Chocolate cookie was good, the bagel was alright. The coffee was under average and the orange juice was alright. I paid 27€ for these 4 items - so absolutely overpriced and feels like a tourist trap. Happened to me, shouldn’t happen to anyone else. Amsterdam has way better places to grab food - unfortunately we were in a hurry.

Name: L'Amour
Review Text: Ok, so we were high and in a desperate need for a coffee and something sweet, so we felt into a trap. Though looking very cute from outside, cakes were awful! Anyway, 3 of those and 2 coffees = 25€ ouch! And no toilet in the end! Luckily Amsterdam has good places to offer as well, it's just they are not on the main streets, obviously.

Review Text: Poor food hygiene; €6 for a stale Belgian waffle; 20 minute wait for 4 people; burnt bagel and stale waffle. Picturesque & cute shop but would not honestly recommend.

Name: L'Amour
Review Text: Ordered two coffees, a smoothie and waffle with whipped cream, strawberries and blackberries. Got a HAIR in my waffle and, despite being friendly, the staff didn't care to make it up to us. The beverages were good though.
